bibl.title: Textual Scholarship and the Making of the New Testament. The Lyell Lectures, Oxford, Trinity Term 2011.
bibl.note: Introduction. - First Lecture: 'The General Procedures'. - Second Lecture: What is a New Testament Manuscript? [see in part. pp. 35-38: The papyri]. - Third Lecture: Understanding How Manuscripts are Related. - Fourth Lecture: Editing the Greek New Testament. - Fifth Lecture: The New Testament of the Future. - Conclusions. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: David C. Parker, Textual Scholarship and the Making of the New Testament. The Lyell Lectures, Oxford, Trinity Term 2011.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2012, 8°, iv-186 pp., 9 tabl., figg. ISBN 978-0-19-965781-0. £ 20.

Introduction. - First Lecture: 'The General Procedures'. - Second Lecture: What is a New Testament Manuscript? [see in part. pp. 35-38: The papyri]. - Third Lecture: Understanding How Manuscripts are Related. - Fourth Lecture: Editing the Greek New Testament. - Fifth Lecture: The New Testament of the Future. - Conclusions. Bibliography. Index.
